leftSection_5.title: How We Simplify Business Setup in Abu Dhabi Airport Free Zone

items.title: Select a Legal Structure
items.description: First,  you can schedule a brief call with our experts to explain your business needs. This will help us to recommend the ideal legal entity

items.title: Choose a Trade Name
items.description: Next, we'll help you brainstorm, search, and register a compliant business name, followed by the selection of the best-fit business activity.

items.title: Pick a Trade License
items.description: Our seasoned consultants will help you attest the necessary documents and submit your licensing application to the ADAFZ Authority.

items.title: Secure Approvals
items.description: Once approved, we’ll pay the fees on your behalf, assist in securing an office space, and issue your trade license.

items.title: Open a Corporate Bank Account
items.description: Lastly, our expert advisors offer ongoing support to help you create a bank account, stay compliant, and simplify payroll management.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What company formation structures can I choose in Abu Dhabi Airport FZ?
items.answer: You can choose from three legal structures, including Free Zone LLC, a branch of a UAE company, or a branch of a foreign company.

items.question: What documents do I need to set up in the Abu Dhabi Airport Free Zone?
items.answer: Generally, you'll need passport copies, a professional business plan, MoA, a lease agreement, and proof of registered address.

items.question: Do I need to own a physical office to launch my ADAFZ business?
items.answer: No, you can explore alternative options, such as flexi-desks, virtual offices, or co-working spaces, to slash costs.

items.question: Can I get an investor or employee visa through ADAFZ?
items.answer: Yes, entrepreneurs and founders can apply for investor and employee visas through the ADAFZ’s government portals. Our seasoned consultants simplify the process to expedite the approval process.

items.question: Does One Nexuz offer ongoing support after business setup?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can connect with our expert business consultants to explore PRO service, visa renewals, and bank assistance packages to ensure a smooth business journey in the UAE.
